entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
